footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Raiden Shogun | Update Date: 08/13/2022 | Editor: ~Z~#0009

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: The Catch (R5), Staff of Homa, Wavebreaker's Fin (R5 recommended), Primordial Jade Winged-Spear, Skyward Spine

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge or ATK% |<goblet>  Electro DMG Bonus or ATK% |<circlet>  CRIT Rate / CRIT DMG

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Secret Art - Musou Shinsetsu
**2)** Elemental Skill: Transcedence - Baleful Omen
**3)** Normal Attack: Origin (Useless)

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
The Catch at r5 is arguably better than any non-Engulfing Lightning option due to the better energy regeneration it offers for a minimal dmg difference.

Atk% Sands will generally deal more dmg but will lower Raiden's energy regeneration for the team.

Due to the high amount of Dmg % in Raiden's kit, her Goblet can also be better as Atk% instead of Electro Dmg in some cases. 

4 piece Emblem is the only artifact set that should be used on Raiden. Nothing else comes close.
